titles.title: Electing members to the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
Electing members to the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

action.text: Ms. Millender-McDonald asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects specified Members to the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
